token.title: Exploring ERC-20 Tokens
token.shortDesc: Learn to build a fungible token using NEAR Protocol.
token.longDesc: We briefly touch on both ERC-20 and ERC-721 before implementing a demo application that lets you issue and interact with your own ERC-20 token.

dapp.title: Exploring a Simple Web-based dApp
dapp.shortDesc: Learn to build a simple distributed application using NEAR Protocol.
dapp.longDesc: We explore a simple dApp modeled after one of hackathon submissions. This dApp let's you make a public promise (a statement or commitment) to someone which they later mark as fulfilled.

bridge.title: Exploring The NEAR-Ethereum Bridge
bridge.shortDesc: Learn to work with the NEAR-Ethereum bridge.
bridge.longDesc: We review the architecture of the bridge and discuss specific use cases and extension points that you can leverage for your own requirements.
